title: The Centre of Excellence for Public Health (Northern Ireland)
abstractText:
This is one of five Centres funded as part of the UKCRC Public Health Research: Centres of Excellence.

Based at Queenâ€™s University Belfast the Centre is building research excellence and multidisciplinary capacity around the social and biological aspects of nutrition and physical activity and the study of inequalities in health and macro-economic determinants.

Website: http://coe.qub.ac.uk/
